Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Laflin
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses temp. rerouted EB: Madison, Ogden, Washington, Loomis and Madison; WB: Madison, Racine, Randolph, Ogden and Madison due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Laflin, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Madison, Ogden, Washington, Loomis and Madison.

Westbound buses will operate via Madison, Racine, Randolph, Ogden and Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
